definition: to leak (of water or gas)/to drip/to drain/to discharge/to leak out/to divulge (secrets)/to give vent (to anger, spite etc)/to disperse/to reduce
to flow out swiftly/to flood/a torrent/diarrhea/laxative

sentences.english: The compound has good effect for curing the diarrhea and dysentery.
sentences.chinese: 本組合物治療泄瀉與痢疾具有很好的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To study the curative effect and security of Huosha oral solution.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究藿砂口服液治療泄瀉的臨牀療效和安全性。

sentences.english: This article presents the authors clinical experience int he treatment of diarrhea on syndrome differentiation.
sentences.chinese: 結合臨牀經驗論述泄瀉辨證論治的體會。

sentences.english: Chronic non-specific ulcerative colitis is a Chinese medicine in areas such as diarrhea.
sentences.chinese: 慢性非特異性潰瘍性結腸炎屬中醫泄瀉等病範疇。

definition: disorder of internal organs caused by overexertion

pinyin: feng1 shi1 xing4 guan1 jie2 yan2

definition: (TCM) consumptive disease, chronic deficiency disorder due to impaired function of inner organs, deficiency of qi, blood, yin and yang/asthenia
injury such as contusion, sprain or fracture from falling, blow etc
(of food) to retain in stomach due to indigestion (TCM)
bacterial tracheitis (inflammation of the windpipe, often caused by Staphylococcus aureus)/henpecked (a pun on 妻子管得严 used in comic theater)
chest and hypochondrium/upper part of the body
